00024 #ifndef HT_ENDIAN_C_H
00025 #define HT_ENDIAN_C_H
00026 
00027 /* GNU libc offers the helpful header <endian.h> which defines __BYTE_ORDER */
00028 #if defined (__GLIBC__)
00029 # include <endian.h>
00030 # if (__BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN)
00031 #  define HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00032 # elif (__BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN)
00033 #  define HT_BIG_ENDIAN
00034 # elif (__BYTE_ORDER == __PDP_ENDIAN)
00035 #  define HT_PDP_ENDIAN
00036 # else
00037 #  error Unknown machine endianness detected.
00038 # endif
00039 # define HT_BYTE_ORDER __BYTE_ORDER
00040 #elif defined(_BIG_ENDIAN)
00041 # define HT_BIG_ENDIAN
00042 # define HT_BYTE_ORDER 4321
00043 #elif defined(_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
00044 # define HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00045 # define HT_BYTE_ORDER 1234
00046 #elif defined(__sparc) || defined(__sparc__) \
00047    || defined(_POWER) || defined(__powerpc__) \
00048    || defined(__ppc__) || defined(__hpux) \
00049    || defined(_MIPSEB) || defined(_POWER) \
00050    || defined(__s390__)
00051 # define HT_BIG_ENDIAN
00052 # define HT_BYTE_ORDER 4321
00053 #elif defined(__i386__) || defined(__alpha__) \
00054    || defined(__ia64) || defined(__ia64__) \
00055    || defined(_M_IX86) || defined(_M_IA64) \
00056    || defined(_M_ALPHA) || defined(__amd64) \
00057    || defined(__amd64__) || defined(_M_AMD64) \
00058    || defined(__x86_64) || defined(__x86_64__) \
00059    || defined(_M_X64)
00060 
00061 # define HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00062 # define HT_BYTE_ORDER 1234
00063 #else
00064 # error The file Common/endian.h needs to be set up for your CPU type.
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #endif /* HT_ENDIAN_C_H */
